name: Huma
description: It was the instinct to see the light that led the baby birds out of their shells.

set.2: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to **15%**/19%/22.5%/26% of ATK every second for **5** seconds.
set.4: Reduce ATK of all targets within **8** meters that are taking damage over time by **10%**/12%/13%/15%. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
